description technical detail:
NEC LCD P462 Display TV 46 Inch Monitor
NEC LCD P462 46 Inch Display Monitor TV is professional grade that increase your messaging options with better-quality screen performance.
Product Overview
The NEC LCD P462 TV 46 Inch Display Monitor provides a top class solution for your digital signage applications it is high contrast, industrial strength design and DSTS (Enhanced Digital Signage Technology Suite) that boasts more than thirty quality features. These NEC P Series displays perfect for nonstop operation in even the toughest environments include public information, airports, retail, hospitals and other locations that need a blend of dazzling images and the maximum level of display management. The NEC LCD P462 46 Inch Display Screen turns heads in company boardrooms as well as leasing and performance applications benefits include a broad collection of inputs including Unrivalled Control, Display Port, and communication choices and better video wall abilities. The built in extension slot future-proofs your monitor savings, allowing for flawless combination of NEC and other manufacturer's components. In addition the ability to simply integrate touch screen technology.
Key Features
Premium Grade High Quality LCD Panel (46 Inch)
OPS (Open Pluggable Specification)
Built-in Expansion Slot for Integration of NEC and Third Party Components
Expanded Association through digital loop through
Compact Packaging helps reduce waste and shipping cost
Complete 1080p HD Resolution
Carbon Footprint Meter Capability (Environment Friendly)
Improved Design with Slimmer depth
NaViSet Administrator2 For Better Management
Resolution (native) 1920x1080
